errors.name: EventIdTooLong
errors.msg: Event ID must be 16 characters or less

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Event name must be 50 characters or less

errors.name: DescriptionTooLong
errors.msg: Description must be 200 characters or less

errors.name: VenueTooLong
errors.msg: Venue must be 100 characters or less

errors.name: DateTooLong
errors.msg: Date must be 30 characters or less

errors.name: InvalidMaxClaims
errors.msg: Maximum claims must be greater than zero

errors.name: MaxClaimsReached
errors.msg: Maximum number of claims has been reached

errors.name: AlreadyJoined
errors.msg: Attendee has already joined this event
